item.name:
Qa Api Interview

### Authentication

Client id: 4

Client secret: 4ovGa5yXfHnWR47wGRVUfKlDTBxC3WQtnkmO5sgs

To authenticate, see the example in php using the guzzle lib.

This will provide you with an access token and give you admin access.

You are free to use any language.

The endpoint for our api will be http://interview-testing-api.webdamdb.com/oauth/token

Be sure to pass all of the correct parameters listed in the below example.

https://laravel.com/docs/5.4/passport#client-credentials-grant-tokens

To make a request see the example in php using the guzzle lib.

https://laravel.com/docs/5.4/passport#passing-the-access-token

###Notes

Api responses are null on purpose.

Don't forget to add the access token on every request.
It isn't listed in the example requests.

The token should expire every 60min.

### Steps

1: Find as many bugs as you can!

2: Write automated tests to verify the bugs

request.description:
Start here. None of these endpoints correspond to any actual user.
This one just returns a response and requires a valid token.
It is here to get you warmed up.

None of these endpoints correspond to any actual user.
This one just returns a response and requires a valid token.
It is here to get you warmed up.

This is a simple text based search api.
It does not support operators, or anything complex for that matter.
Partial matching exists as supported by the function below.
It uses http://php.net/manual/en/function.strpos.php to search text.

Knowing this, can you point out any bugs?
Gets all asset in the system or optionally by asset id
Gets all asset in the system or optionally by asset id
